qna.how_join_event_q: How can I join an event?
qna.how_join_event_a: From the homepage, choose a language that interests you, browse the available sessions, and click ‚ÄúJoin‚Äù. Once on-site, confirm your attendance via the app and join the group to start the game.
qna.cancel_policy_a: Yes, as long as the event hasn‚Äôt started yet. You can cancel directly from the app. This frees up your spot for someone else and keeps the groups dynamic.
qna.account_data_q: What do you do with my data?
qna.account_data_a: We only collect the information necessary to organize the sessions and ensure participants‚Äô safety. Your data is never sold, and you can update or request its deletion at any time.
